Enter the address of the server you want to connect to Suggested Learn more Don't have an account?= Mastodon is a decentralized social media platform which does not rely on one single company and its server. Each Mastodon server is a completely independent entity, able to interoperate with others to form one global social network. Each user account belongs to a specific Mastodon server with it's own rules, admins and regulations, but users from each server can interact seamlessly with users in any other server.
